pros: A 1200 beded hospital with excellent patient management and very coperative staff .
cons: Very busy hospital and have hectic duties

review_title: working environment at khyber teaching hospital
pros: it is a tertiary care teaching hospital affiliated with one of the most prestigious institutes of Pakistan i.e Khyber medical college. it is equipped with modern facilities. very competitive co workers. optimum pays, and facilities for doctors.
cons: adminstration is still working out the proper way of  managing  the very high influx of patients in terms of cleanliness, atitudes of lower staff to the patients, and students.
